mapper.select: select a.*,b.CateName as cateName,c.StyleName as styleName from ti_productshowtemplateinfo as a left join ti_productshowproducts as b on a.CateId=b.CateId left join ti_productshowstyles as c on a.ShowStyleId=c.ShowStyleId where a.TempId = #{tempId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into ti_productshowtemplateinfo (TempInfoId, TempId, ShowStyleId, ImgJson, CateId) values (#{tempinfoid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tempid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{showstyleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{imgjson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cateid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into ti_productshowtemplateinfo
TempInfoId,
TempId,
ShowStyleId,
ImgJson,
CateId,

update ti_productshowtemplateinfo
TempId = #{tempid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ShowStyleId = #{showstyleid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ImgJson = #{imgjson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CateId = #{cateid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where TempInfoId = #{tempinfoid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
